attributes.action: Equalise the Tax Credit System so Pensioners get equal benefits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A single person earning £9,000 pa gets £1,000 in Tax Credits. 
A single Pensioner on £9,000 pa gets nothing. In fact a single pensioner on £6,450 gets nothing. 
This is blatantly unfair.
To take pensioners out of poverty, the Tax Credit upper limit should be equalised.
